date.startDateAfterToday: Start date must be today or later

date.singleDateAfterToday: Date must be after or equal to today

time.endTimeBeforeStartTime: End time must be after start time

payment.title: Payment
payment.subTitle: Enter your credit card info:
payment.authorize: I authorize to charge my credit card above for the present order amount.
payment.confirmDeleteCardTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this credit card?

error.title: Payment Declined
error.subTitle: Please try again with a different method.
error.accountClosed: The customer’s bank account has been closed.
error.accountInvalidAddress: The country of the business address provided does not match the country of the account. Businesses must be located in the same country as the account.
error.accountRequiresAdditionalInfo: Your account has already onboarded as a Connect platform. Changing your country requires additional steps.
error.accountInformationMismatch: Some account information mismatches with one another.
error.accountNumberInvalid: The bank account number provided is invalid (e.g., missing digits)
error.applicationFessNotAllowed: The proposed money movement could not be completed due to regulatory reasons.
error.balanceInsufficient: The transfer or payout could not be completed because the associated account does not have a sufficient balance available. Create a new transfer or payout using an amount less than or equal to the account’s available balance.
error.bankAccountDeclined: The bank account provided can not be used to charge, either because it is not verified yet or it is not supported.
error.bankAccountUnusable: The bank account provided cannot be used. A different bank account must be used.
error.bankAccountVerificationFailed: The bank account cannot be verified, either because the microdeposit amounts provided do not match the actual amounts, or because verification has failed too many times.
error.cardDeclineRateLimitExceeded: This card has been declined too many times. You can try to charge this card again after 24 hours.
error.expiredCardCopied: The card has expired. Check the expiration date or use a different card.
error.incorrectCVC: The card’s security code is incorrect. Check the card’s security code or use a different card.
error.incorrectNumber: The card number is incorrect. Check the card’s number or use a different card.
error.invalidCVC: The card’s security code is invalid. Check the card’s security code or use a different card.
error.invalidExpiryMonthCopied: The card’s expiration month is incorrect. Check the expiration date or use a different card.
error.invalidExpiryYear: The card’s expiration year is incorrect. Check the expiration date or use a different card.
error.invalidNumber: The card number is invalid. Check the card details or use a different card.

declineError.genericDecline: The card was declined for an unknown reason. Please contact card issuer for more information.
declineError.insufficientFunds: The card has insufficient funds to complete the purchase. Please use an alternative payment method
declineError.cardNotSuportted: The card does not support this type of purchase. Please contact card issuer for more information.
declineError.authenticationRequired: The card was declined as the transaction requires authentication.
declineError.approveWithId: The payment cant be authorized. Please try again later
declineError.cardVelocityExceeded: Card credit limit exceeded. Please contact card issuer for more information.
declineError.currencyNotSupported: The card does not support the specified currency.
declineError.duplicateTransaction: A transaction with identical amount and credit card information was submitted very recently. Please check to see if a recent payment already exists.
declineError.expiredCard: The card has expired. Please use another card.
declineError.invalidAccount: The card, or account the card is connected to, is invalid. Please contact card issuer for more information.
declineError.invalidAmount: The payment amount is invalid, or exceeds the amount that’s allowed.
declineError.issuerNotAvailable: The card issuer couldn’t be reached. Please try again later.
declineError.notPermitted: The payment isn’t permitted. Please contact card issuer for more information.
declineError.offlinePinRequired: The card was declined because it requires a PIN.
declineError.pinTryExceeded: The allowable number of PIN tries was exceeded.
declineError.processingError: An error occurred while processing the card. Please try again later.
declineError.reenterTransaction: The payment couldn’t be processed by the issuer for an unknown reason. Please try again later.
declineError.incorrectNumber: The card number is incorrect. Check the card’s number or use a different card.
declineError.incorrectCVC: The card’s security code is incorrect. Check the card’s security code or use a different card.
declineError.invalidExpiryMonth: The card’s expiration month is incorrect. Check the expiration date or use a different card.
declineError.invalidExpiryYear: The card’s expiration year is incorrect. Check the expiration date or use a different card.
declineError.invalidNumber: The card number is invalid. Check the card details or use a different card.

postCheckout.accountRequired: An account is required to manage your booking and complete all mandatory tasks.
